attributes.action: accept that coloured people can be racist too.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is unfair that if some one white refers to and asian or coloured person by callin them something refering the colour of their skin or where they come from they are deemed racist but if a black or asian etc person refers to a british or white person using horrible slang words and words relating to the colour of their skin an dor country they are from it is not picked up or considered  an offence

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
